message:
"Distilled Cosmos"

A seer,
Cigarette-soothed, celestial susurration.
Unsettled stars for Argentina,
Chaos pulses at the helm.
Fate, mischievous, whispers, "Yet, twinkling remains."
prompt: ‘I see chaos’: Argentina waits to see if stars align under Javier Milei As one of Argentina’s foremost astrologers, Gael Policano Rossi spends much of his life contemplating the future – and his prognosis for 2024 is bleak. “I see chaos,” he replied when asked what the new year had in store for his country after the temperamental far-right libertarian Javier Milei became president. As Policano smoked cigarettes down to their carrot-coloured ends, he predicted
